Uther.name: Holy Light
Uther.description: Heal target allied Hero for 362 (+4% per level) Health. When used on a target other than Uther, also heal Uther for 181 (+4% per level) Health.

Uther.name: Holy Radiance
Uther.description: Heal all allied Heroes and Minions in a line for 177 (+4% per level) Health, dealing 177 (+4% per level) damage to enemies.

Uther.name: Hammer of Justice
Uther.description: Deal 109 (+4% per level) damage and Stun the target for 1 second.

Uther.name: Divine Shield
Uther.description: Make an allied Hero Invulnerable and increase their Movement Speed by 20% for 3 seconds.

Uther.name: Divine Storm
Uther.description: Deal 170 (+4% per level) damage and Stun nearby enemies for 1.75 seconds.

Uther.name: Devotion, Eternal Vanguard
Uther.description: Allied Heroes affected by Uther's Basic Abilities gain 15 Armor for 2 seconds.  This effect does not stack with itself.  Upon dying, Uther becomes an Invulnerable spirit for up to 8 seconds. While in spirit form, Uther can heal allies with Flash of Light.

UtherEternalVanguard.name: Flash of Light
UtherEternalVanguard.description: Heal an ally for 230 (+4% per level) Health.

1.name: Silver Touch
1.description: Quest: Reduce damage from Heroic sources with Devotion.  Reward: After reducing damage 40 times, Holy Light's Mana cost is reduced from 90 to 70.  Reward: After reducing damage 80 times, Holy Light's Mana cost is reduced to 50, and its range is increased by 50%.

1.name: Wave of Light
1.description: Quest: Damage or heal Heroes 60 times with Holy Radiance.  Reward: Increase the duration of Devotion by 0.5 seconds.  Passive: Damaging or healing Heroes with Holy Radiance refunds 5 Mana and reduces its cooldown by 1 second.

1.name: Hammer of the Lightbringer
1.description: Quest: Basic Attack enemies 75 times.  Reward: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Hammer of Justice by 1.5 seconds.  Passive: Basic Attacks restore 1.5% of Uther's maximum Mana.

4.name: Holy Shock
4.description: Holy Light can be used on an enemy to do 50% of its healing amount as damage. When used this way, Uther receives its self-healing benefits, its cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds, and it refunds 45 Mana.

4.name: Pursuit of Justice
4.description: Hammer of Justice increases Uther's Movement Speed by 25% for 3 seconds.

4.name: Holy Fire
4.description: Deal 13 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes increase this damage by 20% for 3 seconds. This can stack up to 3 times.

7.name: Armor of Faith
7.description: Being Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced causes Holy Light's cooldown to recharge 200% faster for 6 seconds.

7.name: Guardian of Ancient Kings
7.description: Healing a Hero that is Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced increases the Armor bonus they receive from Devotion from 15 to 50.

7.name: Hand of Protection
7.description: Activate to make target ally Unstoppable for 1 second. Cannot be cast on Uther. Basic Attacks reduce Hand of Protection's cooldown by 5 seconds.

10.name: Divine Shield
10.description: Make an allied Hero Invulnerable and increase their Movement Speed by 20% for 3 seconds.

10.name: Divine Storm
10.description: Deal 170 (+4% per level) damage and Stun nearby enemies for 1.75 seconds.

13.name: Blessed Champion
13.description: For the next 5 seconds after using Holy Light, Uther's Basic Attacks heal him and nearby allied Heroes for 15% of the total amount healed by Holy Light.

13.name: Well Met
13.description: When used against Heroes, Hammer of Justice reduces the target's Movement Speed and damage dealt by 25% for 3 seconds.

13.name: Spell Shield
13.description: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

16.name: Beacon of Light
16.description: While below 50% Health, Uther receives 200% more self-healing when healing others with Holy Light.

16.name: Tyr's Deliverance
16.description: Allies healed by Holy Radiance receive 40% increased healing from all sources for 6 seconds.

16.name: Benediction
16.description: Activate to reduce the Mana cost of Uther's next Basic Ability by 50 and its cooldown by 10 seconds.

20.name: Bulwark of Light
20.description: Divine Shield lasts 2 seconds longer and its cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds.

20.name: Divine Hurricane
20.description: Divine Storm's radius is increased by 50% and its cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds.

20.name: Redemption
20.description: After Eternal Vanguard ends, Uther revives at the spirit's location with 50% of his maximum Health.  This effect has a 180 second cooldown.

20.name: Divine Protection
20.description: Applying Devotion to a Hero that is already affected by Devotion increases their Armor by an additional 15.
